title: UrlCodec
contents:
API > @angular/common > @angular/common/upgrade
mode_edit code

UrlCodeclink

用于编码和解码 URL 部分的编解码器。

A codec for encoding and decoding URL parts.

abstract class UrlCodec { abstract encodePath(path: string): string abstract decodePath(path: string): string abstract encodeSearch(search: string | { [k: string]: unknown; }): string abstract decodeSearch(search: string): {...} abstract encodeHash(hash: string): string abstract decodeHash(hash: string): string abstract normalize(href: string): string abstract areEqual(valA: string, valB: string): boolean abstract parse(url: string, base?: string): {...} }

根据所提供的字符串、搜索、哈希和基本 URL 参数标准化 URL

Normalizes the URL from the provided string, search, hash, and base URL parameters

The base URL for the URL

可选. 默认值是 `undefined`.

mode_edit code

根据基本 URL 解析 URL 字符串

Parses the URL string based on the base URL
abstract parse(url: string, base?: string): { href: string; protocol: string; host: string; search: string; hash: string; hostname: string; port: string; pathname: string; }

url string

完整的 URL 字符串

The full URL string

The base for the URL

可选. 默认值是 `undefined`.
